Content.Text:
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aha! Hi, <MYNAME>! You came at just the right
time!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Go on, Big Sis! It's best to ask an expert about
this kind of thing!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
My sister wants you to teach her all about the
ins and outs of dating!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
M-Melanie! You shouldn't just ask something
like that right out of the blue! It's rude!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
But Sis! Even though you're all grown up now,
you haven't ever gone on a single date!
<PAGE>
What're you going to do when you finally find
somebody to crush on? You'd better learn now,
while you can!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So <MYNAME>, I was thinking it'd be super if
you could teach my sister everything you know
about love! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yay! Thanks so much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, see?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME> agreed! Go ahead and ask stuff! Ask
everything you can think of! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Umm...o-okay. What's the difference between
liking someone as a friend and liking them
as...more than that?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? O-oh. So just being with someone you love
makes your heart pound and brightens your
whole day? Okay.
<PAGE>
Then that's the way you feel every time you hang
out with Kamil?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh! Ooh! My turn to ask a question! ♪
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, what about Kamil made you fall in
love with him?
His kindness.
His seriousness.
Nothing in particular.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, okay! Yeah, being kind is super important,
isn't it?
<PAGE>
I mean, all fairy-tale princes are smart and
handsome and really, really kind.♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Come to think about it, I always knew Kamil was
a good guy, but he seems especially good to
you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Yeah! Anybody would want to take extra special
care of the person they loved.
<PAGE>
And not only that, whenever I see him looking at
you, <MYNAME>, it's always with a super-duper
sweet look!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Someday, I wanna find a prince who'll love me
and look at me like that. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah. Huh. After talking to you about it,
<MYNAME>, I kinda want to try falling in love
myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee! Asking <MYNAME> was definitely the
right thing to do. Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, now that you really wanna give love a try,
Big Sis...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Let's go out and look for some Prince
Charmings of our own! Let's go, let's go! ♪

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wh-what?! Right now? I-I didn't say "right this
second"!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>C'mon, let's go! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Me-la-nieee!!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Ummm...I didn't mean to eavesdrop, but er...you
three were loud enough I could clearly hear you
upstairs...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>, I...I had no idea that was the way
you thought of me.
<PAGE>
Thanks. I'm really happy to hear it.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>I, um...I really like how kind you are, too. And
your smile...and your laugh...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Just being with you makes my heart pound. It
brightens my whole day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wow, saying that out loud is...embarrassing.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ummm...a-anyways, since you're here, do you
want to come up to my room and hang out for a
bit?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great. C'mon up.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, okay! Yeah, being serious about stuff like
work and responsibilities is probably a good
thing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Yeah, and Kamil looks like he takes his
relationship with you really seriously,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah. Huh. After talking to you about it,
<MYNAME>, I kinda want to try falling in love
myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Hee hee! Asking <MYNAME> was definitely the
right thing to do. Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>, I...I had no idea that was the way
you thought of me.
<PAGE>
I'm not sure how "serious" a person I really am,
but I do want to be serious about you...about
us.
<PAGE>
You're important to me, and I want to treat you
that way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Wow, uh...actually saying that out loud is kinda
embarrassing.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great. C'mon up.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? There wasn't really any one thing at all?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Oh! So it just kinda hit you out of the blue, and
all of a sudden you fell in love? That sort of
thing can happen, too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>A "bolt out of the blue," huh? I'm not sure I
understand what that'd be like.
<PAGE>
Do you think I might feel something like that
someday?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Of course! I know it'll happen!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>Are you sure? I'm having trouble trying to picture
it. I guess I still don't really get what "love" is.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hanging out with my friends is fun we generally
don't have any misunderstandings, so I think I'll
stick with that for now--
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Okay, stop right there. Let's go find your Prince
Charming before you dry up into a wrinkly old
maid!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>Huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, thanks for letting us ask you stuff!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
C'mooon, Big Sis! Let's go right now!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wh-what?! Right now? B-but I said I wasn't
going to worry about love right now--
<PAGE>
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Let's go, let's go! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Me-la-nieee!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ummm...I didn't mean to eavesdrop, but er...you
three were loud enough I could clearly hear you
upstairs...

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><MYNAME>, I...I had no idea that was the way
you thought of me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But I'd...er, never mind.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>No matter what brought it about, I'm just glad
that you're in love with me now.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Anyway, since you're here, do you want to come
up to my room and hang out for a bit?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great. C'mon up.
